DataElement.preferredName: Wechsler Adult Intelligence Scale - Fourth Edition Block Design Scaled Score Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of the scaled score for the Block Design subtest in the Wechsler Adult Intelligence Scale, Fourth Edition.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Wechsler Adult Intelligence Scale - Fourth Edition Block Design Scaled Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The fourth version of the Wechsler Adult Intelligence Scale that was published in 2008. It is a test designed to measure intelligence in individuals ranging in age from 16 to 90 years._A subtest of the Wechsler Adult Intelligence Scale, 4th Edition that measures spatial perception, visual abstract processing, and problem solving._Conversion of a raw score on a test to a common scale that allows for a numerical comparison.
